definition: Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: It is an alternative for the investors to develop residential areas in the metropolitan fringe.
sentences.chinese: 大都市邊緣區住宅開發是大多數開發商的可能選擇。

sentences.english: Most pearls have a soft silvery-white or cream shine.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠大都有柔和的銀白色或奶色光澤。

sentences.english: There are no or faint enzyme reaction products in low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 低分化腺癌上述酶大都無反應或反應微弱。

sentences.english: Anchorage usually develops in the Southwest seaward slope.
sentences.chinese: 錨地大都發育在西南向海坡。

sentences.english: He was dazzled by the gaiety and splendour of the metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 大都市的花花世界使他感到眼花繚亂。

sentences.english: That $300 for entertainment is mostly going to restaurants.
But the desert is encroaching on this metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 但是，沙漠正侵蝕着這個大都市。

sentences.english: Thangka handed down mostly works of Tibetan Buddhism and Bon.
sentences.chinese: 傳世唐卡大都是藏傳佛教和苯教作品。

sentences.english: Most reports on us slashers are inaccurate and biased.
sentences.chinese: 關於我們這些腐女子的報道，大都不準確且帶有偏見。

sentences.english: Both Jesus and Alexander died at age 33.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌和亞歷山大都死於三十三歲的英年。

sentences.english: William. Nature's Metropolis: Chicago and the Great West. W. W. Norton & Company, 1991.
sentences.chinese: 一部關於芝加哥如何成爲西部大都市的重要研究。

sentences.english: Yuan Dadu for the site of the Great Temple of Wanning Tianshou Center Court.
sentences.chinese: 原址爲元大都大天壽萬寧寺之中心閣。

sentences.english: Gratuity is customary in this money-mad  metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在這個金錢至上的大都市裏，給小費是司空見慣的。

sentences.english: Today, Beijing has already developed into a modern international metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 今日的北京，更已發展成爲一座現代化的國際大都市。

sentences.english: As happened in that boom, most of these ideas will come to naught.
sentences.chinese: 就像那次熱潮一樣，這些思想大都一事無成。

sentences.english: London is one of the greenest capitals in the world.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦是世界上最環保的大都市之一。

definition: for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
in large part/the greater part/the majority
have plenty of/there's no lack of
